Tips.title: Flexible Quantities in Recipes
Tips.description: Used when the exact amount may vary depending on taste or need.

Tips.title: Situational Use in Instructions
Tips.description: Indicates to apply or add an element only if required, without strict necessity.
Tips.example: Use the extra support as needed for stability.

Elementary.wordDefinition: Elementary implies a simpler or essential aspect, while 'as needed' specifies a conditional or flexible use.
